tool.name: Mutate
tool.description: : Class to mutate one amino acid by another in a 3d structure.

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: mutation_list
param.label: mutation_list
param.help: Mutation list in the format "Chain:WT_AA_ThreeLeterCode Resnum MUT_AA_ThreeLeterCode" (no spaces between the elements) separated by commas. If no chain is provided as chain code all the chains in the pdb file will be mutated. ie: "A:ALA15CYS"

param.name: use_modeller
param.label: use_modeller
param.help: Use Modeller suite to optimize the side chains.
